name: grunion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a Californian fish that lays its eggs in the sand at night: City maintenance crews have stopped raking the city's beaches to avoid disturbing areas where grunion spawn. Grunion are a knife-sized fish native to Southern California.
Steve Howard/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesSand raking disturbs grunion eggs during their delicate incubation period.The grunions' behaviour must give them some survival advantage. There are no good counts of the grunion population.
